Module nl.naturalis.common

Package nl.naturalis.common.function

package nl.naturalis.common.function
Classes and interfaces related to functional programming.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.naturalis.common
    Contains various static method utility classes for working with strings, arrays, collections, etc.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    IntObjRelation<T>
    Defines a relationship between an integer and an object.
    IntRelation
    Defines some kind of relationship between two integers.
    ObjIntRelation<T>
    Defines some kind of relationship between an object and an integer.
    Relation<T,U>
    The Relation interface and its sister interfaces in this package assess the presence of a relationship between two objects.
    ThrowingBiFunction<T,U,R,X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's BiFunction interface where the apply method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingConsumer<T,X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's Consumer interface where the accept method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingFunction<T,R,X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's Function interface where the apply method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingIntConsumer<X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's IntConsumer interface where the accept method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingIntFunction<R,X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's IntFunction interface where the apply method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingIntSupplier<X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's IntSupplier interface where the get method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingSupplier<T,X extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's Supplier interface where the get method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
    ThrowingToIntFunction<T,E extends Throwable>
    An alternative to Java's ToIntFunction interface where the apply method is allowed to throw a checked exception.
